user_query: I'm researching the statistics of roulette spins. Could you fetch the last 30 spin histories from the XXXtremeLightningRouletteAPI? Additionally, I need a joke to lighten the mood. Please provide me with the joke of the day from the World of Jokes API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the last 30 spin histories from the roulette API.
Fetch the joke of the day from the World of Jokes API.
